text: Following is a table of United States presidential elections in Arizona, ordered by year. Since its admission to statehood in 1912, Arizona has participated in every U.S. presidential election. The winners of the state election are in bold and shown with the colour of their political party. {| class="sortable wikitable" |- ! Year ! Winner (nationally) ! Votes ! Percent !
